data.text:
@Patbagley Poor Bags. You live in a state you hate. What I have never seen from you are solutions. You just bitch and moan. 

You aren’t any better than those you complain about.
@Patbagley Can I start a go fund me to help you move to Portland?
@Patbagley @BoycottUtah Theocracy isn’t ever a healthy governance system.
@Patbagley Trans people are not 'ordinary' Utahns. They still deserve respect, but they are not ordinary.
@willstevensonwj @Patbagley Why do you think they waited until after the close of the filing period to push the trans ban?
@Patbagley It seems to be contagious! The idiots have taken over in my state too!
@Patbagley Worse by the year as these republiqunts get bolder and bolder
@Patbagley Things not going your way comrade?
